messages.subject: unchurching/bible errancy
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/25/03 10:20:28 AM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/25/03 10:20:28 AM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< My apologies. I should have looked it up my own self. >>

It's ok Heidi.
It's that kind of stuff, taken for granted that I find common in Bible
literalists. They want to stick their fingers in their ears and sing loudly
to avoid hearing what facts you have that disprove anything they believe.....
It's sad, and very unthinking of them. :)
But you're going straight to hell in a handbasket for seeing TRUTH, right in
front of your eyes. It baffles me a little...but then I just remember I was
SO like that for a large part of my life.
I didn't know squat about the Bible until I got away from those type of
people.

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
"Unschooling support at pensacolaunschoolers.com
